revised_title: Fossil Mammals of Australia: Mandibular Dentition and Parts of the Skeleton of Palorchestes
tldr: This article by Professor Owen discusses the mandibular dentition and skeletal parts of the extinct genus Palorchestes, as well as providing additional evidence for other extinct species like Macropus Titan, Sthenurus, and Procoptodon. The author also comments on the transitional nature of these forms between saltigrade and gravigrade groups of marsupials.
